name: Bad Spider Thief
description:
Use your brain and steal the items and treasures you want, playing for fun.
Train your logic, memory, intelligence, problem-solving skills, and creativity.
Be careful! Because if you're found by the police, you can still go to jail.

🌟GAME FEATURES:
- Easy and simple but humorous game process
- Fun for All Ages: The best trivia game for family & friends’ gatherings
- Enjoy this impossible quiz.
- Endless fun and brain-pushing games.
- Great exercise for the brain.
- Simple and highly addictive game play.
- Great time pass with riddle games.
- Funny sound and witty game effects

Superheroes don't just have good superheroes, you have bad superheroes too.

Let's play and experience.
